title: Generate
description: Start by clicking the 'Generate' button to begin the process of creating video transcripts, summaries, or AI-generated voiceovers.
reminder: No downloads available at this step. This is just the starting point.

title: Transcribe
description: Upload a video file or provide a video URL. The system will transcribe the audio into the selected language, if captions are not already present.
reminder: Downloads are available depending on your free tier status.

title: Summarize
description: Choose how you'd like the content summarized. You can use a transcript PDF, a previously generated summary, or a video URL. Specify the focus, length, and style of the summary.
reminder: Downloads are available if allowed by your free tier status.

title: Audio
description: Generate an AI-powered voiceover from your summarized content. Free users have a time limit for audio generation.
reminder: Audio downloads depend on your free tier limitations.

title: Video
description: Paid users can create a video based on the summarized project. This feature requires an active subscription.
reminder: This feature is only available to paid users.
